TEXT.S:
Georgiau Georgiasa i labu nu Asia, itiza i 42 00 N, 43 30 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 69,700 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 69,700 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 0 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 4,928,052. kakalukan umah sa 35.50%, kilakilangan umah sa 39.40%, zumaay henay umah sa 25.10%. caay ka mucabaya a kanatal nu Taywan. Georgia miawas tu Europe atu Asia tusaay a talu, nika u sikasaan ku Europe nu lalay hawsa, sisa pala Europe han tu kya kanatal.[1]
(u kamu nu Hulam: )
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Tbilisi.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 26 bulad 5 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Salome Zourabichvili (Salumiye.Culabisewiyeli Â·), 1952 a mihca 3 a bulad 18 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Georgiaayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihca 10 bulad 16 demiad.
cunliu cunli nu Georgiaayza sa ci Irakli Garibashvili, micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 2 bulad 22 demiad.
nu kakitidaanGeorgia u kakitidaan mulilis tu masalumeniay a bayu', micapi tu amisan u Russia, satimulan sa u Turkey, Armenia, Azerbaijanmalalitin.[2] (u kamu nu Hulam: )
binacadanaywini u niyadu'ay a Georgia nu binacadanay hawsa (70.1 a kilac/%/pasintu), u dumaay nu itiniay tu a tademaw caay kahacica ku binacadan nu Armeniaa binacadan, Russiaatu Azerbaijana binacadan mamin; nu i talakaway a kamuway sa nu Georgia mamin ku kamu, muenenngay i tiniayay tu a tademaw sa u nu Russiaa kamu; u katuuday tu a tademaw hawsa nu tuncenkiwku lihayen, caay kahacica ku milihayay tu nu Islamkiw.[3] (u kamu nu Hulam: 70.1%;;)
manameci tikay Georgia u nu malukay a kanatal, u heci atu uciya ku nipalumaan. Georgia budu' a epah idaw tu ku waluay a malebud nu mihecaan ku tenes nu likisi. u saka idaw hena tu kuwan-can, atu munatu ton. 2001 a mihecaan Georgia a tademaw i kanatal 54 a kilac (%, pasintu) ku pakuucay a tademaw. (u kamu nu Hulam: 200154%) namakay i 21 a sikiay, Georgia u manamecay u katinenga tu sisapalahad tu. 2007 a mihecaan, Georgia a kanatalayay tu hawsa ku nikatahkal mamin, kiyadahan ku naayaway a mihecaanay tu 12 a kilac (%, pasintu), kuynian u Georgia mala nuwalian a Europeu sakalankanmay ku nikacakadan "manamec tan-uy"tu cacay. nu kitakit a kinku (World Bank) kiyu pala "u saayaway i kitakit u manamecay a nikasumad".[4] (u kamu nu Hulam: 21200712%""World Bank"")
likisiu Georgia naw pacacay nu "Su-Lian milabuway tu kung-he'-kuo". u nu "Su-Wey-Ay a siykay tu nikalecad a nikalcabaycabay"nu kanatal. 1991 a mihecaan u "Su-Lian" malaliyas tu nadikudan, yu mahida henay idaw ku sabaw tu limaay nu milabuway tu sakalcabay mahamin tu masacacay kiya kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam: """"1991""15) 1991 a mihecaan sepat idaw ku siwa nu demiad u Georgia mapahezek tu masacac, nadikudan namasacacay hawsa sumad hantu nu talakaway ku ngangan nu kanatal pala u "Georgia nu macamulay a kanatal'' han. 1995 a mihecaan walu a bulad idaw ku tusay a sepat nu demiad makaawas tu baluhay a hulic, panganga han tu "Georgia a kanatal".[5] (u kamu nu Hulam: 199149""1995824"")
cen-cemibabelih tu RussiaGeorgia naw u Su-Lianhenay ku mikuwanay tapang Ci Se-Ta-Lin (, Joseph Stalin) a niyadu', nika u Georgia atu Su-Lian caay kasasukapah ku nikalcabay. Georgia namakay masacacay ku su-lin tu dikudan sa. nu taway a nikuwan micapi' tu nu Europe atu Amilika.[6] alahican makakuwang tu Er'-Lo-Se caay tu kacacumud, nu sadikuday sa wamasasikedaan tu a papicumud a malcabay tu Europe a malasacabayay.[7] (u kamu nu Hulam: Joseph Stalin) Georgia nu ilabuay tu ku katuuday u caay kaleca nu binacadan, u Georgia atu maylabuwayay nu "na-aw-say-di-ya" hinalalebu kutademaw masasuedes,kiyu nu dikudan u nan-aw-say-ti-ya pakunida satu u heni tu ku patideng masacabaay a kanatal. Nan-Aw-Say-Ti-Ya hamin nu lala' sa idaw ku 3900 km2, u tademaw idaw ku pituay a manga nikayadah.[8] (u kamu nu Hulam: ""39007) 2008 a mihecaan u Georgia a hetay masatedep ku ngangan, malinngatu micumud i "Nan-Aw-Say-Ti-Ya" a kakitidaan Er'-Lo-Se mipadang kalankan sa micumu' i labu malpapadang, mademec ku Georgia kya hitay, mahida u Er-Kuoaya hitay ku makakuwan masatedep "Nan-Aw-Say-Ti-Ya" nu malcabayay a kanatal nika sacacayay a ti-wey, nika nu makacuwacuwaay a kanatal caay amin kasasulul , umahiniay a hicanaca. (u kamu nu Hulam: 2008) nutipan nu Georgia "A-Pu-Ha-Ce a kakitidaan", idaw tu ku 24 a mangnu tademaw, lala' sa idaw ku 8,600 km2, i 1992 a mihcaan masacacay sa tu, Georgia a hetay kinapina mayhidih pa satedep tu nikakuwangan cacay kalaheci, 2008 a mihecaan Russiaa hitay hamin sa mipadang, ya Georgia a hitay mamin mabahbah, u Russiaa hitay mikiayaw aca itida micumuh muhalhal tiya a "A-Pu-Ha-Ce a kakitidaan" bala nu Russia a nipaading tu kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam: ""24860019922008"") "A-Pu-Ha-Ce a kakitidaan" atu "Nan-Aw-Say-Ti-Ya" kina tusaay a kakitidaan misamaku tu Georgiaauy a lala' atu 18 a kilac (%, pasintu), Er'-Lo-Se sangalepeng tu ku nu Georgiaay sakanatalkahinawalan, sangalepeng tu kina tusaay a kanatal tu nikalacus.[9] (u kamu nu Hulam: """"18%) 2019 a mihcaan, Georgia atu Russia kasenung satu masulacus, Russia a cung-tung pu-tin "Vladimir Putin" i enemay a bulad idaw ku tusa abataan idaw ku tusa a demiad misasulid tu sakay lacus mubahel a sulid, u nikasaan kunikahida i pitu a bulad idaw ku waluay a demiad caay tu pisulul papibahel tu Russia tayda i Georgia, Russia a milubang tu a mibaking ku sihu "u mamibakinay ku caay katatudang u patelacay ku mahiniay a kawaw".[10] (u kamu nu Hulam: 2019Vladimir Putin62178) 2019 a mihecaan enem a bulad idaw ku tusaay a bataan nu demiad u "tungcenkiwmilubang" (lnteparliamentary Assembly on Orthodoxy) i Georgia nu niyadu' Te-Pi-Li-Si "Tbilisi" malingatu tu cacay amihecaan u kinacacay a milubang, u Russia a ki-inmilubang tu ci Kay-Hu-Li-Lu-Hu (Sergei Gavrilov) ku malatapang, enen sa i lalubanan nu Georgia tu papangihaan nu tapang (tapang a kididaan) milubang a pangiha. (u kamu nu Hulam: 2019620""Interparliamentary Assembly on OrthodoxyTbilisiSergei Gavrilov) u mahiniay a kawaw yadah tu ku caayay kaedem nu tademaw, masasulacus tu masuedes tu, cacay tu a emang ku tademaw mipuluay tu sakaykian nu Georgia, idaw ku milihidaay a tademaw mucelcelay tu mipulu' nu tailing, micumud tu kuo-hui kakaykian. u Ba-Sin-Sepangihaay a misullid makaadih, yadah tu kumakatukuhay nu mitupinnay tu madukaay a papiliyas tu tademaw.[11] (u kamu nu Hulam: )
